alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 10:44PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN KEMPER AND CENTRAL LAUDERDALE COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CST... At 1043 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Meridian Station to near Marion to near Savoy. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Meridian, Toomsuba, Lauderdale, Tamola, and Kewanee around 1050 PM CST. Alamucha around 1055 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for east central Mississippi.
